channel.title: Resource Management on blog
channel.description: Recent content in Resource Management on blog

item.title: SSH clients and Linux command line for interacting with supercomputers during evolutionary analysis
item.description: At the time of this writing, I am fortunate to be doing my PhD at BYU, which is a great environment to work on biogeography, systematics and evolution mainly because of the great people with similar interests that seem to always be attracted to the place. However, I am also very fortunate that at my institution we have excellent infrastructure and internal resources for conducting the highest quality research in molecular evolution and ecology.
